title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Number of knockdowns landed in each Month on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Donald Cerrone where Number of knockdowns landed is 20.0.
The lowest category is found at Thiago Alves where Number of knockdowns landed is 13.0.
The highest value at Donald Cerrone is almost 1.54 times larger than the minimum value of Thiago Alves.
The highest value at Donald Cerrone is almost 1.54 times larger than the minimum value of Thiago Alves.
The difference between the max Month Donald Cerrone and min Month Thiago Alves is 7.0.
